name: Punchy League
description:
A T-Rex, Pyromaniac and Unicorn start a fighting league...

Welcome to Punchy League, where your phone is the arena and everyone is a challenger! Play the endless single player mode or punch your friends in competitive 2-player match-ups! Just one device required! Join the league today!

◈◈◈ FEATURES ◈◈◈

- Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
- Simple, fun and rewarding challenges
- 40 colourful characters with various difficulties, sound effects and backgrounds
- Epic and challenging boss battles for each character
- Old school 2 PLAYER MODE on one device! (Punch, kick and breath fire at your friends)
- 70 In-game objectives plus 40 online leaderboards and achievements!
developers: D.K COONAN & T.J NAYLOR & W.J SMITH & D WONG
publishers: D.K COONAN & T.J NAYLOR & W.J SMITH & D WONG
